player_information.key_achievements: 2020 Heisman Trophy winner, Super Bowl LIX champion, helped Alabama win two national championships, Eagles rookie record for receiving yards (916), three consecutive 1,000+ yard seasons (2022-2024), fifth player ever to win Super Bowl, college national championship, and Heisman Trophy
player_information.performance_goals: continuing to be a top-tier receiver in Philadelphia's offense alongside A.J. Brown and contributing to more championship runs

team_information.team_strategy: building around a young core with dual elite receivers (Smith and A.J. Brown), strong offensive line, and championship-caliber roster
team_information.team_success: Super Bowl LIX champions, multiple playoff appearances, NFC Championship appearances
team_information.salary_cap_space: Managing significant investments in top receivers Smith ($25M AAV) and Brown ($25M AAV)

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: receptions, receiving yards, touchdowns, team success, availability/durability (missed only 1 game due to injury), and playoff performance

family_information.family_priorities: engaged to childhood sweetheart Mya Danielle (as of December 2024), raising two daughters
family_information.children_education: providing for two daughters' education and future

coaching_management.coaching_experience: Head Coach Nick Sirianni (multiple years of experience)
coaching_management.player_coach_relationship: 4 years with Sirianni, described as having strong relationship with coaching staff
coaching_management.gm_experience: Howie Roseman (Executive Vice President/General Manager with extensive NFL experience)

ownership_information.ownership_experience: Philadelphia Eagles ownership with long-standing franchise history
ownership_information.championship_success: Super Bowl LIX champions, previous Super Bowl appearances including Super Bowl LVII
ownership_information.business_priorities: building championship teams, investing in core players early, maintaining competitive roster
